name: Bacon and Egg Sandwich
description: Bacon and egg sandwich topped with chopped onions and eggs benedict.

name: BBQ Pork
description: BBQ pork and ramen served with a side of kimchi and miso soup.

name: Coconut Soup
description: Chicken, vegetable, and Thai herbs boiled in a coconut milk.

name: Seafood Curry
description: Seafood boiled in mixed coconut curry. Served inside a coconut.

name: Pan Fried Shrimp
description: BBQ shrimp pan-fried in Thai herbs

name: Spaghetti with Bacon and Egg
description: Bacon and spaghetti served in a creamy alfredo sauce. Topped with a salted egg.

name: Pancakes with Scrambled Eggs
description: Pancakes topped with bananas and whipped cream. Served with a side of scrambled eggs.

name: Bubble Waffle with Icecream
description: Fried crispy waffle filled with whipped cream, strawberries, and blueberries. Served with a side of icecream.

name: Mixed Berry Cake
description: Vanilla pound cake topped with shipped cream and mixed berries.
